SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Interface ClientInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public interface ClientInterface
Interface containing the methods the client can call.

    • setOnConnectionAction

      void setOnConnectionAction(int response, List<Integer> startingGamesId, List<Integer> gamesWithDisconnectionsId)
      Method used to perform the action.
      Parameters:
      response - is the action to perform.
      startingGamesId - is the list of the starting games' id.
      gamesWithDisconnectionsId - is the list of the games with disconnections id.

      Parameters:
      size - is the size of the lobby.

      Method used to place the starter card.
      Parameters:
      side - is the side where the starter card is placed.
      starterCard - is the starter card.

      receiver - is the receiver of the message.
      message - is the message to be sent.

      Method used to place the card.

      card - is the card to be placed.
      placingCoordinates - are the coordinates where the card is placed.
